Reviews.Title: “Less than average”
Reviews.Author: Justman14
Reviews.Content: Terrible Internet connection and bad service. Average food and poor bedrooms. Nice pool and entertainment area.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel looks much better from the outside than it actually is.”
Reviews.Author: DrDGeorge
Reviews.Content: I attended a conference at the hotel and found the meeting hall conference facilities quite good. However the rooms were old, the furniture was dirty and stained, and the hall carpets smelled of mold. The restaurant has buffet-style food that is OK. However, I believe the selection of food is highly limited to tourist-oriented bland and uninspired versions of Turkish food. I would have liked more authentic fair as the buffet food all starts to look and taste the same after a few days. The grounds are well kept and provide a nice environment for a casual stroll. I did not swim, but the slide and pool appeared to be great fun for the kids. The internet service in the room never worked.

Reviews.Title: “One of my favorites, room was kind of old though”
Reviews.Author: Sana E
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this resort for 3 nights, and I loved it. Even though the room was kind of old and need to be updated, it was very clean. The balcony we had had an amazing view.

Reviews.Title: “dont expect a lot”
Reviews.Author: mirnawella
Reviews.Content: we booked 3 nights but we think to leave from the first minutes,it was too hot,no ac working,5 times they tell us they will come for maintenance no body come,the villa is dirty i sware me and my kids became sick cant take our breath there is something wrong in the villa,also it is too far from the swimming pool and the sea,we change the villa same problems,i am surprised it is really a beautiful place and it was fully booked so why no maintenance, no service ?!!!!

Reviews.Title: “An exceptional Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JohnTripoli
Reviews.Content: I was accommodated here by airline [Flight delayed] If I had to stay somewhere, then this was an excellent hotel to do so. It is a large hotel, with all modern features. Food was excellent, breakfast is buffet-style with ample choice of cooked, or continental style. As my stay here was unplanned, I was pleasantly surprised, the room was clean, comfortable, with great view from my window of the sea, very quiet. There is TV and tea / coffee making facilities, in each room....there is also Wi-fi available in all public areas. The only down-side is the location of hotel resort from Istanbul airport, one hours drive!.

Reviews.Title: “internet access sucks”
Reviews.Author: Dawabsheh
Reviews.Content: i am now in the resort, and just singed in to tell u that if u cant be disconnected then do not come to this resort because the internet access is very bad. i have to fill in the user namd and password every two minutes.. imagine this... :(

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - basic service”
Reviews.Author: walker044
Reviews.Content: Stayed here several times, the hotel is really nice - better than staying in the city and although it takes ages to get to Istanbul from here (traffic not distance is the issue) I would still stay here for Istanbul. Hotel has great pool and beach facilities, a bowling alley and sports area and a health suite. Rooms are basic, the local love of smoking makes them smelly and they are well worn in particular in the bathrooms and the stained carpets, ripped cutains that do not close. This year the reception service was poor, its not normally, but on check in I was ignored whilst several Turkish guests checked in loudly around me and on check out they just could not add up the bill - be prepared to wait AGES and be prepared to be LOUD to get any service at all. Buffet meals - included in my book in price - are uninspired, restaurant menu if its working is ok, there are decent vegetarian options on both menu. WIFI in reception only - but free, in room barely connects.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible experience, terrible service you want to forget about as of some ridiculous nightmare”
Reviews.Author: victoria_popin
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very old. Many things just don't function there, especially service. We were at the trip combining leisure and business. No matter what we asked, there always was a problem, either it is to call the taxi or clean Your room that has not been clean or exchange the minibar fridge that was not working. You have to tell them 3-4 times before they do anything about them, but all the time they say You "Don't worry it's on the way". When we wanted to rent a car, and contacted reception, they were eager to help. And then we were waiting for the car that was "on the way" as receptionists told us for 2 days!!!! We had to postpone the business meetings for 2 days. Such waste of time and money! No matter what You ask personnel is just saying what You want to hear, lying in the eyes, and doing nothing with that. All the time staying there You feel like a fool....

Reviews.Title: “A hotel which i would not really suggest for a seaside holiday”
Reviews.Author: ZeynepViyana
Reviews.Content: Eventhough the personnel of the hotel was marvellous (helpfull, quick in fullfilling wishes and very friendly) the quality of the hotel was not top at all. The furniture in the whole hotel (especially in the public areas, rooms and even fitnessroom) needs to be renewed. The housekeeping ladies did their best to clean everything to the last detail, but as long as the furniture looks old, there is not much one can do to improve the optic. Another minus point: one can not really swim in the Marmara Sea located right infront of the hotel (quiet dirty) but the swimmingpools were marvellous. We booked halfboard meaning breakfast and dinner - both were perfect (big variety of food and delicious - we even thought of taking the cook with us back home :-). The market within the hotel is a joke, since it provides (beside daily newspaper and pool towels) nothing of relevance to the client. But there is a very big shopping center (Maxi) in the near vicinity to which a "dolmus" (transfer) service exists. Overall, I left the hotel relaxed and quiet happy after a week.

Reviews.Title: “great resort, frindly staff, delicious food”
Reviews.Author: ksayar
Reviews.Content: Very nice Resort, a big rooms, friendly guys & girls in the reception, really good food, needs a renovation. I'm now staying in Klassis resort in Silivry( 1 hour from Istanbul â€“ Turkey ) for 3 nights, this is my third time staying in this resort, the resort is great, the reception guys & girls are very friendly & always smiling & speaking English very well not like other hotels in Turkey. Location: it is just 5 minutes by taxi from down town & from nice mall called Maxi City. Food: The food in Klassis resort is wonderful, you can find so many kinds of starters & main & sweets, & all are realy delicious, & the location of the food hall is fantastic facing the pool & the sea. Rooms: I stayed in room No. 352, it is nice & big & facing the sea & the pool, I think all rooms are facing the sea. there is 3 point I didnâ€™t like in Klassis Resort: 1.bathroom is little bet old & needs renovation, & the furniture as well. 2.the rooms has no safety box, so we should get down to keep our money & expensive things. 3.key of the room is very heavy. 4.the whireless internet is weak & not fast, but I can open the pages. I think Klassis Resort is a very good resort for relaxing & honey moon.

HotelInfo.Name: Klassis Resort Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Karga Burun Mevkii | Silivri, Istanbul 34570, Turkey
